TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
So this is it? You really want to fight Ragnar?
So this is it? You really want to fight Ragnar?
So this is it? You really want to fight Ragnar?
So this is it? You really want to fight Ragnar?
Yes. I feel certain we have Ragnar's attention. I will go on alone from here. In one week, return to this place.
Yes. I feel certain we have Ragnar's attention. I will go on alone from here. In one week, return to this place.
Yes. I feel certain we have Ragnar's attention. I will go on alone from here. In one week, return to this place.
Yes. I feel certain we have Ragnar's attention. I will go on alone from here. In one week, return to this place.
One week? Why?
One week? Why?
One week? Why?
One week? Why?
You will understand when it is time. Farewell, human. Great things lie before you, but remember you must still learn a measure of patience.
You will understand when it is time. Farewell, human. Great things lie before you, but remember you must still learn a measure of patience.
You will understand when it is time. Farewell, human. Great things lie before you, but remember you must still learn a measure of patience.
You will understand when it is time. Farewell, human. Great things lie before you, but remember you must still learn a measure of patience.
Farewell, old friend.
Farewell, old friend.
Farewell, old friend.
Farewell, old friend.
